Title: S3:E3 - What is cryptocurrency? (Preethi Kasireddy)
Description: What is bitcoin? How do cryptocurrencies work? What is the blockchain? Preethi Kasireddy, a blockchain engineer, gives us a gentle introduction to the world of digital currencies. She walks us through how it all works, what developers should care about, and how she transitioned from a career in finance to being a blockchain engineer. Show Links Partner with Dev & CodeNewbie!
